appStoreOptimization.longDescription:
MyQuran is your comprehensive Islamic companion, designed to help you explore the Quran, read authentic Hadiths, learn Duas, and track your spiritual journey with a beautiful, respectful interface.

FEATURES:
• Complete Quran with multiple translations
• Authentic Hadith collections from Bukhari, Muslim, and other major compilations
• Comprehensive Dua collection with Arabic text and translations
• Reading progress tracking with streak counters
• Achievement system to motivate consistent reading
• Offline reading capability for uninterrupted access
• Beautiful, respectful design honoring Islamic traditions
• Advanced search functionality across all content
• Bookmarks and personal notes
• Dark mode for comfortable reading
• Mobile-optimized interface

Whether you're a student of Islam, a practicing Muslim, or someone interested in learning about Islamic teachings, MyQuran provides authentic, verified content in a modern, user-friendly format.

Start your spiritual journey today with MyQuran – where tradition meets technology.
